name: BeanWars
description:
BeanWars is a fast-paced multiplayer game where players take on the roles of different beans and engage in intense, free-for-all battles with up to 16 players. With seven different weapons and a variety of strategic approaches, the game offers a  bean-themed twist on traditional multiplayer action. Although the game was created in just seven days, its pretty fun to player with your friends. Come join the battle and prove your bean-based dominance in BeanWars!

Since this was for my own little gameJam challenge, its not going to get any new updates.

By the way, make sure to set your username in the options and sensitivity
